content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress made in a legal case over a period of 136 days the case involves a participant who is owed 19419 euros one of the coowners ac complained about the abusive behavior of the other coowners in the common courtyard and requested to exercise their right to use the common courtyard or if not possible the division of the common property a regulation was put in place to restrict the use of the common courtyard except for temporary parking for loading and unloading the case was then referred to a mediation body mr c filed an application for mediation regarding a division issue the parties involved agreed to participate in the mediation attempt and had several discussions and separate sessions they reached a conciliatory agreement regarding the use of the common courtyard and the allocation of costs the value of the mediation was set at €500000 with a mediation indemnity of €50000 the conciliation agreement will be subject to registration tax and has been certified by the lawyers involved the mediator declared the proceedings closed and the parties are responsible for paying the mediation fees which can be made through a bank transfer overall the parties reached a conciliatory agreement through mediation and the case has been closed
